sources.description:
A drone pilot (Sean Bean) involved in a deadly, covert mission overseas must confront the reality of his actions when a mysterious man seeking revenge holds his family hostage.  Edited for YouTube ad standards.

Directed by Jason Bourque
2017
Starring: Sean Bean, Mary McCormack, Joel David
